com.copperboard.ConfigurationApi

Class ConfigurationAPI.ConfigurationSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.copperboard.ConfigurationApi.ConfigurationAPI.ConfigurationSection
  • Enclosing class:
    ConfigurationAPI

    public static class ConfigurationAPI.ConfigurationSection
extends java.lang.Object
    ConfigurationSection class. Responsible for keeping a map of values loaded from a file.
    See Also:
    getInt(String), getFloat(String), getDouble(String), getLong(String), getBoolean(String), getString(String), set(String, Object), save(), reload()

      • ConfigurationSection

        public ConfigurationSection(java.lang.String path,
                            boolean create)
        ConfigurationSection instance
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the file
        create - If true then a new file will be created, false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Reload the configuration instance emptying the map and loading the values from the file again. If the file doesn't exist it will be created automatically.

      • reload

        public void reload(boolean create)
        Reload the configuration instance emptying the map and loading the values from the file again.
        Parameters:
        create - If true then a new file will be created, false otherwise

      • save

        public void save()
        Save the Configuration to a file. A new file will be created if one doesn't exist.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The value or false if doesn't exist

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.String key,
